title: Jail Time: ‘PlugWalkJoe’ Gets 5 Years for Twitter Hack and Sim Swapping
description:
By Waqas

PlugWalkJoe (Joseph James O'Connor) will also return $749,000, which he admitted to stealing from a Manhattan-based cryptocurrency firm.

This is a post from HackRead.com Read the original post: Jail Time: ‘PlugWalkJoe’ Gets 5 Years for Twitter Hack and Sim Swapping
